name: Responsive Web Design
description: Crafting websites that seamlessly adapt to various devices, providing an optimal user experience.

name: Frontend Development
description: Building interactive and user-friendly interfaces using modern frontend technologies like React, Vue, or Angular.

name: Backend Development
description: Creating robust server-side applications and databases to power dynamic and scalable websites.

name: E-commerce Solutions
description: Developing secure and feature-rich online stores with payment gateway integration for seamless transactions.

name: SEO Optimization
description: Optimizing websites for search engines to improve visibility and drive organic traffic.

name: Web Maintenance
description: Providing ongoing support, updates, and maintenance to ensure websites run smoothly and securely.
